website_summaries.verdict: A dual marinator and food preservation container you can use in kitchens with limited space.
pros: The sealable lid design is stackable for easy storage in cramped spaces
Top tube creates a tight seal for preserving foods and marinating liquids in a short amount of time
cons: Lid does not snap on well

customer_reviews.title: Flavor Enhancement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to marinate meat, its plugged into my Geryon vacuum machine (the vacuum hose came with the Geryon). This canister has three positions on the top, one sets to a Food Saver model, second position is for all other machines an then the third position close and storage. Have used this a few times now , have really enjoyed the salmon I have marinated. It's a good purchase and very pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: A "Food Saver" must
customer_reviews.text: If any of you have a food saver with the marinate feature, you "must" purchase the marinator. It does an exceptional job with beef, chicken, ribs, pork, etc. We usually let it run through a few cycles to marinate thoroughly. Great for broil, bake and BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Great Marinator
customer_reviews.text: Have used this several times in marinating meat before grilling. Really gets the flavor into the meat. Would recommend if you are into cooking. I'm thinking of getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for marinating stakes and chops and holds a vacuum well.
customer_reviews.author: Terraed

customer_reviews.title: A god send
customer_reviews.text: Great shape for the freezer or fridge. Our food has kept so well that there is little wastage. Good for marinator or just as a food saver canister. The whole concept is such a 'friendly' product to the Earth - recycleable and reduces food waste. I wish everyone would get at least one of the food saver products.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Yours

customer_reviews.title: Kiss the quiche good-bye!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this marinator not to marinate but to keep salad, or other "greens" in it to make them last longer. Since I am single many vegetables were spoiling on me just lying in the refrigerator crisper,even in ziplocs. And using the FoodSaver bags are a bit of a hassle. I bought the Tila and it does the trick. No offence to quiche lovers! I had it once in the early 80's and actully liked it. Let's see was it Quiche Lorraine, or Lorraine that served me quiche?
customer_reviews.author: Happy Jack

customer_reviews.title: food saver marinator
customer_reviews.text: I have used a marinator for many years and it developed a little crack on the bottom which slowly leaked air into the container, even though it still made the little "whush" sound when I opened it...so I replaced it. I use it alot, and wouldn't want to do without it! Wish they made one larger, but this size is adequate for the two of us.
customer_reviews.author: luv my foodsaver

customer_reviews.title: Quick Marinator
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the greatest products I have ever ever purchased. The lid fits nice and tight. It has a huge area for putting almost anything in. I don't know how I ever did with out it all these years. There is absolutely nothing on the market as good as this product. I tell you now, it is the best thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my kitchen. Every recipe used so far tastes better with this method of marination. The luxury of marinating for 45 minutes to achieve an "overnight or 24 hour marinade" effect is so helpful in my busy, not always carefully planned out life!!!! I love kitchen toys that enable my free spirit's spontaneity.
customer_reviews.author: KW writer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent marinator
customer_reviews.text: Well-made. Great size for a big honkin' porterhouse steak or chuck roast etc. Also works well for multiple kabob items as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: gnosnhoj

customer_reviews.title: NOT Self-Vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: I am an idiot and didn't read the fine print. I thought that this container had a mechanism in it to create the vacuum, like some sort of pump. Apparently it has to be used with a FoodSaver vacuum machine though. Too bad my gift recipient didn't realize that before the package was thrown away. Now we are stuck with an overpriced container. Again, my fault, just hoping to warn others.
customer_reviews.author: Envelope Deb

product_meta.title: Jarden Tilia 2.25qt Quick Marinator
product_meta.description: FoodSaver Marinate in minutes instead of hours. In a vacuum, marinades penetrate deeper and more quickly, so your favorite recipes can get started in no time. Perfect for the home chef, the 2 1/4 quart square canister can also be used for convenient vacuum storage. The base is microwaveable and dishwasher safe (top rack); the lid should be hand washed with a damp cloth. Dishwasher safe stoneware and lid for easy clean-up Bonus Cookbook Included
feature_bullets: Convenient warm setting keeps food warm without overcooking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars19 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
